thread.section_title: IGO-POST Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of IGO-POST | igopost.ie
thread.title: Ms. Paulette Murray
thread.title_full: IGO-POST reviewed by Ms. Paulette Murray

author: Ms. Paulette Murray
title: Ms. Paulette Murray
text: In my experience IGO-POST is an excellent company In customer service and delivery. The staff are polite ,helpful, upbeat and really listen to what the customer wants. They are professional , trustworthy and keep delivery deadlines. I have ordered from them over the last 18 months and am very happy to recommend IGO-Post
